nodes.text: Drooga's pleasure barge was the luxurious sail barge of Drooga the Hutt, who used it to throw enormous parties of feasts on the moon Nar Shaddaa. It was said a person's ability to amuse Drooga was the only barrier to entry onto his pleasure barge. The barge traveled across Nar Shaddaa, making stops in various places as Drooga saw fit, but the party itself was practically never ending.
Drooga's pleasure barge appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Smuggler class mission on Nar Shaddaa.
